goal.description: Secure a job in Software Engineering or Machine Learning

subPlans.justification: Jimmy has a strong passion for continuous improvement, making a positive difference, and leveraging his skills in programming and problem-solving.

actionItems.what: Complete and refine resume and LinkedIn profile
Apply to at least 5 jobs weekly
Practice technical interviews using Leetcode and mock interviews

actionItems.when: Second and fourth Wednesdays of the month

subPlans.justification: Jimmy values independence and wants to establish a stable personal environment for growth and social development.

actionItems.what: Save $1000 per month for moving costs and rent

goal.description: Build healthy habits for personal growth and stability

subPlans.justification: Good health and stable habits will enable Jimmy to sustain his ambition and efforts toward other goals.

actionItem.what: Develop a morning routine with exercise and mindfulness
Maintain a sleep schedule of 8 hours nightly

goal.description: Make new friends and expand social circle

subPlans.justification: Jimmy values connections with others and wants to build meaningful relationships.

actionItems.what: Join local interest groups or clubs
Attend social mixers or community events monthly
Host a casual gathering for new acquaintances
